content.text:
[@moid](@Sur8RwcDh6kBjub8pLZpHNWDfuuRpYVyCHrVo+TdA/4=.ed25519)

Oof, that's not a good look. Reminds me of the DHS press release:

> [We Must Secure The Border And Build The Wall To Make America Safe Again](https://www.dhs.gov/news/2018/02/15/we-must-secure-border-and-build-wall-make-america-safe-again)

And look, they even managed to make sure they used exactly 14 words. What a coincidence.
